short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily copy LaTeX equations from Wikipedia and KaTeX-enabled websites with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily copy LaTeX equations from Wikipedia and KaTeX-enabled websites with a single click.

v1.1.0 -- fixed some UX issues
- fixed notification not responding to scroll
- fixed hover effect appearing in weird location for Wikipedia equations
- fixed hover effect not appearing for longer dynamic KaTeX elements (e.g. when using ChatGPT)
